sentences.en: If you are housebound, you can arrange for a home visit from a specialist adviser.
sentences.cn: 如果你出不了门，可以预约专家顾问上门就诊。

sentences.en: She was forever running errands for her housebound grandmother.
sentences.cn: 她总是在为她不方便外出的祖母跑前跑后。

trans.tran_cn: 居家不外出的，不能离家的
trans.tran_en: not able to leave your house, especially because you are ill or old
